unnormalised: Arre yaar, every month the electricity bill gives me a heart attack! Last month it was ₹3500, this month it's already ₹4200 and it's only the 15th! At this rate, I might as well sell my kidney to pay the bills. Anyone know where I can get a decent price for a slightly used kidney? Asking for a friend, obviously. And BSNL broadband? Don't even get me started... ₹899 for 'unlimited' data which gets throttled after 50GB. Comedy show chal raha hai kya?
normalised: Arre yaar, every month the electricity bill gives me a heart attack! Last month it was rupee three thousand five hundred, this month it's already rupee four thousand two hundred and it's only the fifteenth! At this rate, I might as well sell my kidney to pay the bills. Anyone know where I can get a decent price for a slightly used kidney? Asking for a friend, obviously. And B-S-N-L broadband? Don't even get me started... rupee eight hundred and ninety nine for 'unlimited' data which gets throttled after fifty gigabyte. Comedy show chal raha hai kya?
